description: Pre-shaped pants for daily wear: the Skytree Pants Men are made from a robust polyamide fabric. More freedom of movement thanks to spandex content. A water-repellent DWR treatment provides protection from rain. Thanks to a pre-formed ‘O’ shape, the Skytree Pants impress with their great fit. Several pockets with water-repellent zippers. A reflective ‘X’ on the right calf creates a visual highlight. Perfect for daily use – the Skytree Pants Men.
name: Mammut Skytree Pants, Reg - Mens
